<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">[Bane](/Spells.aspx?ID=18)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 320 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 5-foot emanation

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** Will

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You fill the minds of your enemies with doubt. Enemies in the area must succeed at a Will save or take a –1 status penalty to attack rolls as long as they are in the area. Once per turn, starting the turn after you cast _bane_, you can use a single action, which has the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) trait, to increase the emanation's radius by 5 feet and force enemies in the area that weren't yet affected to attempt another saving throw. _Bane_ can [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) [_bless_](/Spells.aspx?ID=25).
name: Bane

text: Bane Source Core Rulebook pg. 320 4.0 Traditions Divine, Occult Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Area 5-foot emanation Saving Throw Will Duration 1 minute --- You fill the minds of your enemies with doubt. Enemies in the area must succeed at a Will save or take a –1 status penalty to attack rolls as long as they are in the area. Once per turn, starting the turn after you cast bane , you can use a single action, which has the concentrate trait, to increase the emanation's radius by 5 feet and force enemies in the area that weren't yet affected to attempt another saving throw. Bane can counteract bless .
